review: We bought our Chromecast to reduce power consumption -- all our streaming media had previously been through our PlayStation, which eats electricity for breakfast. Aside from some VERY minor bugs that are usually taken care of immediately by software updates, we have had no problem with it. I'd recommend Chromecast to anyone looking for a simple-to-use streaming device.
